summary: Diff shows only a change to SafeGeneratedImage plus updates to repo metadata/summaries. There is no evidence in the diff that the required Gift 2 photo assets were added at the exact public paths, nor that valentineContent.ts was updated to use exactly the required HER_PHOTOS filenames/order. Live redeploy/validation (REQ-24) cannot be confirmed from this diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the three user photo files for Gift 2 exist in the repo at frontend/public/assets/generated/ with exact case-sensitive filenames and are reachable via /assets/generated/<filename> after deployment.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, and none of the required image paths appear as created/modified assets in the diff. Therefore there is no evidence the three JPEGs were added under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify/correct Gift 2 config so Gift 2 gallery is driven only by HER_PHOTOS and uses exactly ['IMG_0131-1.jpeg','IMG_4617-1.jpeg','IMG_0156-1.jpeg'] in that order with no placeholders.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff content for frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts is shown; only a separate summary file mentions it. Without an actual change to valentineContent.ts in the diff, there is no evidence HER_PHOTOS was verified/updated as required.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) (mentions valentineContent.ts, but is not the source file diff)
<file-diff>: Modified files list does not include frontend/src/config/valentineContent.ts

missing_requirements.requirement: Rebuild/redeploy and validate on the live site that Gift 2 shows the three user photos (no fallback), and if failures persist capture failing URLs and network errors/status.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff contains no deployment output, live-site validation evidence, or captured failing URLs/status codes.
evidence: <file-diff>: only code/metadata changes; no logs or validation artifacts

hallucinated_features.description: Added a loading skeleton/state and a more detailed fallback UI (shows filename and 'Expected at: /assets/generated/<filename>') in SafeGeneratedImage.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on ensuring the correct Gift 2 assets exist and HER_PHOTOS is configured; it does not request adding loading UI or expanded fallback messaging.
